data.text: Awake, awake! Put on your strength, Zion.
For Yahweh says, “You were sold for nothing;
“Now therefore, what do I do here,” says Yahweh,
Therefore my people shall know my name.
How beautiful on the mountains are the feet of him who brings good news,
Your watchmen lift up their voice.
Yahweh has made his holy arm bare in the eyes of all the nations.
Depart! Depart! Go out from there! Touch no unclean thing!
For you shall not go out in haste,
Behold, my servant will deal wisely.
Just as many were astonished at you—
so he will cleanse52:15 or, sprinkle many nations.
